name: rewind-workspace
description: Workspace package to encapsulate the rewind npm packages

scripts.build: npm run build-protocol && npm run build-common && npm run build-worker && npm run build-cron && npm run build-web && npm run build-api
scripts.start-api: npm run _ln-web-api && cd packages/rewind-api && npm run start
scripts.start: npm run start-worker & npm run start-cron & npm run start-api
scripts.clean: npm run clean-protocol && npm run clean-common && npm run clean-worker && npm run clean-cron && npm run clean-web && npm run clean-api
scripts.build-and-start: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build-and-start-cron: npm run clean-cron && npm run build-cron && npm run start-cron
scripts.update-and-pub-protocol: npm run update-protocol && npm run pub-protocol
scripts.update-and-pub-common: npm run update-common && npm run pub-common
scripts.update-and-pub-cron: npm run update-cron && npm run pub-cron
scripts.update-and-pub-api: npm run update-api && npm run pub-api
scripts.update-and-pub-web: npm run update-web && npm run pub-web
scripts.update-and-pub-worker: npm run update-worker && npm run pub-worker
scripts.update-and-pub: npm run update-and-pub-protocol && npm run update-and-pub-common && npm run update-and-pub-web && npm run update-and-pub-api && npm run update-and-pub-cron && npm run update-and-pub-worker
